org.forgerock.openig.heap

Class NestedHeaplet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openig.heap.GenericHeaplet
      • org.forgerock.openig.heap.NestedHeaplet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Heaplet
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public abstract class NestedHeaplet
extends GenericHeaplet
    A generic base class for a heaplet nested within the class it creates. Using a nested heaplet has the advantage of avoiding loading classes unless the requested class is actually being created in a heap.

    DEPRECATION NOTICE: This class has been deprecated as for OpenIG 3.1: Heaplets don't require to be Indexed anymore. Please extends directly GenericHeaplet instead.

    See Also:
    GenericHeaplet
